sentence.Network_en: Powdering a sweaty nose will only block up the pores and make the skin more uncomfortable.
sentence.Network_cn: 往出汗的鼻子上扑粉只会堵塞毛孔，使皮肤更加不舒服。

sentence.Network_en: Beauty - conscious women have been powdering their skin since ancient times.

sentence.Network_en: All these can effectively prevent ceramic based Talc from aging and powdering.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些都可以有效地防止滑石瓷的老化和粉化.

entry.def: Powder consists of many tiny particles of a solid substance.

example.ex: Put a small amount of the powder into a container  and mix with water...
example.tran: 把少量粉末放入容器，加水混合。

example.ex: The wood turns to powder in his fingers.
example.tran: 木头在他指间会变成粉末。

entry.def: Powder is the same as face powder .
If a woman powders her face or some other part of her body, she puts face powder or talcum powder on it.

example.ex: She powdered her face and applied her lipstick and rouge.
example.tran: 她往脸上搽了粉，抹了口红和胭脂。
老妇人那张搽了粉的脸

entry.def: Powder is the same as gunpowder .

example.ex: The smell of powder was in the air.
